suggest.meta_keywords: Traceroute, Network Diagnostic, Command Line Tools, Linux Traceroute, Windows Traceroute, macOS Network Utility, Network Performance Issues, Troubleshoot Network, Packet Travel Diagnostics, Network Command Guide
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to use Traceroute on Windows, macOS, and Linux to diagnose network issues. Guides include step-by-step command usage for network diagnostics.

current.meta_description: Traceroute is a network diagnostic tool, that our technical support use to diagnose performance and delivery issues.
